citeinfo.origin: Palmer Field Office, U.S. Natural Resource Conservation Service formerly Soil Conservation Service
citeinfo.title: Copper River Basin Area 612 Soil Survey

descript.abstract: Data Type: Vegetation/Land Cover/Soils; Soil survey reports and accompanying maps for areas throughout the state. Various surveys are intended to provide information relevant to development for urban use, rangeland, cropland or farming; selection of road, pond, or building sites; or value of the land as wildlife habitat. Tabular data in the reports includes soil characteristics (pH, depth, etc.), suitability and limitations of soil types, and flood hazard information. This tabular data is also available in database format.

idinfo.accconst: Reports (with maps) and databases are available by request to the Palmer Field office.
idinfo.useconst: Data not intended for site specific purposes

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

cntaddr.address: NOAA / AFSC / PMEL, 7600 Sand Point Way N.E.
